_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three things you should develop to g: Perceptions of renunciation to give up sensual perceptions
Perceptions of good will to give up malicious perceptions
Perceptions of harmlessness to give up cruel perceptions
